intro: Fedia cephalophora, commonly known as the common fedia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is characterized by its small, clustered white or yellowish flowers and opposite, elliptical leaves. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as forests and woodlands. It produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds. Fedia cephalophora is often found in tropical and subtropical regions across Asia and Africa.
